name: Fruit Swap
description:
Swap to match 3 or more fruits in a line in delicious Fruit Swap. Join 100% organic fun journey which is full of unexpected twists. Embark on fresh and sweet adventure and enjoy never ending fun with Fruit Swap now!

Fruit Swap New Features
✿ Super simple to play: Just swap & switch
✿ Dozens of powerful and interesting boosters
✿ Cute and fresh fruit design
✿ 144 awesome match 3 levels
✿ Appetizing and fruity maps: Watermelon Trail, Tangerine Cave and Yummy Gulf
✿ Get social! Compete globally via leaderboard
✿ Popular and well-known match-3 gameplay
✿ Delicate but perplexing barriers: 5 Layers Strawberry Muffin, Jumpy Monster, Chocolate Virus

How to Play
✿ Swap and match 3 or more fruits to collect
✿ Swap and collect 4 or more fruits to create powerful special fruits
✿ Complete level targets within limited moves

Satisfy your sweet tooth longing for fruity fruit! Download and play Fruit Swap!
